directive_ref: CEO DIRECTIVE WAVE 15/15A - AUTONOMOUS GOLDEN NEEDLE HUNT WITH SOURCE ATTRIBUTION

sources.snippet_or_excerpt: The Bank of Japan plans a historic interest rate hike, impacting the global economy and leading to volatility in cryptocurrency markets.
By officially putting an end to the quantitative tightening (QT) on Dec. 1, the US Federal Reserve has initiated the first steps for...
Despite calmer prices after October's brutal leverage wipeout, bitcoin and ether market depth remains structurally thin, creating a more...
Let's uncover how the Bitcoin four year cycle now tracks politics and liquidity. Are elections replacing halving events as price drivers?
Japan's rising bond yields drive gold and silver higher while pressuring Bitcoin as global liquidity tightens.

hypothesis_content.title: Post-Liquidity-Crash Volatility Compression & Regime Break
hypothesis_content.statement: After the October 'liquidity crash,' sustained low volatility (BTC 20-day realized volatility < 40%) in a NEUTRAL regime will be followed by a high-magnitude directional move (>8% in 3 days) upon a break of a key technical level, with the direction of the break predicting the short-term trend.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Major liquidity dislocations (like October's crash) reset market participant positioning. Subsequent periods of low volatility and price compression represent a buildup of latent energy. A break on volume signals a resolution, often leading to a sustained move as new liquidity enters or exits in the direction of the break.
entry_conditions: Price consolidates within a 5% range for at least 7 days
Price closes outside the 20-day Bollinger Band (2 std dev) on above-average volume (volume > 1.2 * 20-day avg volume)

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price reaches a 1:2.5 Risk/Reward ratio based on the width of the preceding consolidation range
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price re-enters the prior consolidation range (close back inside the 20-day BB)
exit_conditions.time_exit: If no clear follow-through (new 3-day high/low) within 3 days of entry, exit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Multiple instances of volatility compression followed by a technical break that immediately reverses and returns to the range (a 'false break') would disprove the predictive power of the setup in the current market structure.
